title: FS: Old Mill Slers, Kleinow Boston Polar Bear ***SOLD***

posts.post_title: FS: Old Mill Slers, Kleinow Boston Polar Bear ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me and delivered. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or negotiations. 

SGC 1.5 SLer Bernhard with an Old Mill back. Nice color. $155 ***SOLD***

SGC 1.5 Lentz SLer with an Old Mill back. Star back stamp. $120 ***SOLD***

SGC 1.5 Bay SLer with an Old Mill back. Big borders. $135 *** SOLD***

SGC 2 Kleinow Boston. Tough variation with a killer Polar Bear back $165 ***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!
